headline: Does CSX’s Recent 14% 2025 Rally Still Leave Room for Long Term Value?
summary: If you are wondering whether CSX is still a solid value play after its recent run, or if the train has already left the station, this breakdown will help you assess whether the current price makes sense. CSX shares have quietly climbed, up 0.8% over the last week, 6.9% over the past month, and roughly 14%+ year to date. This suggests that investors may be becoming more positive on the rail company again after a choppy period. Behind those moves, the market has been reacting to a mix of...
